title: Secret Tailing Mission
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Huh? Umi-chan, what are you doing? You look kind of nervous.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I saw Honoka telling Eli that she needed to talk to her earlier.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I see. But why are you nervous about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Whenever Honoka asks Eli for help, she always has a weird smile on her face...... She has to be up to no good......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I get it now... Okay, Iâ€™ll tail her with you, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Whaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Youâ€™re worried, right? Letâ€™s do something about it instead of just sitting here! Plus, itâ€™ll be fun to tail them~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Iâ€™m not trying to goof around, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I understand, nya~ ğ…  Come on, letâ€™s go look for them together...... Ah, look at the courtyard. Isnâ€™t that Honoka-chan and Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yeah! Okay, Rin, letâ€™s head to the courtyard!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
